A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Decent movie\, but shows little respect for Star Wars as a whole. Introduces serious plot holes and question marks in the earlier films. Is Poe really on a whole different level than Anakin and Luke as a pilot? Why couldn't Obi Wan intervene in the fight against Vader? If Leia can do what she did\, then surely Mace Windu is still alive\, right? I could go on for days. \n\nMark Hamill was amazing\, though.
